product.title: Centerforce - Clutch Cover & Disc - Stock Replacement FJ40, FJ45, FJ55, FJ60 1974-1987
product.body_html:
Fits: 8/1974 - 8/87 FJ 40/45/55/60 Series Land Cruiser, with 4.2L 2F engine AND stock 4 speed manual transmission.

Whether you are an avid off-roader, have a hot-rodded 2F under the hood, or simply want a performance-oriented clutch, this stock replacement from Centerforce is the clutch you have been searching for!

The Centerforce I clutch series is designed as a high-quality entry-level performance clutch for those in need of a superior stock replacement. Using the patented Centerforce centrifugal weights and premium friction materials, the Centerforce Stage 1 clutch system is perfect for applications with stock engines or mild power increases from minor bolt-on modifications.

- Patented centrifugal weight design

- Light pedal effort

- High quality friction material

- Smooth engagement

*Note - The throw out bearing is not included.

Please allow 5-7 days before shipping. This item is custom made at time of order and dropped shipped directly from our manufacturer.
